info.name: ZiraAI Complete API Collection
info.description:
ZiraAI Plant Analysis API - Complete Collection

Includes:
- Phone-based Authentication (2-step OTP: login-phone, verify-phone-otp, register-phone, verify-phone-register)
- Email-based Authentication
- Referral System Integration
- Plant Analysis Endpoints
- Subscription Management
- Sponsorship System

Last Updated: 2025-10-03
